General.Name: Nanjing Red Sun Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Red Sun Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, manufacture, and sale of pesticides and other chemicals in China. The company offers herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, plant growth regulators, rodenticides, sanitary insecticides, and three-drug intermediates, as well as fine chemicals. It also provides technical consultation services. Nanjing Red Sun Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Nanjing, China.
